name: Grilled Marshmallow Nutella®
author: Diverse Cookers :-)
summary: This delicious dessert hits the spot for anyone, young or old. The marshmallow melts in your mouth with a smooth taste of Nutella®. The slightly crunchy buttery taste of the bread ties everything together making this an irresistible delight. It's okay, we all need to indulge once in a while.
ingredients: 1 cup miniature marshmallows, or as needed
directions: Spread chocolate-hazelnut spread evenly over 2 slices of bread
Place remaining 2 slices bread over marshmallows creating 2 sandwiches
Spread butter over both sides of each sandwich
Place both sandwiches in a skillet over medium heat and grill until golden brown, about 5 minutes per side
